array0.name: Grilled Salmon - 250 gr
array0.details: Indulge in the savory delight of our Grilled Salmon, a culinary masterpiece that will tantalize your taste buds. This perfectly cooked 250g salmon fillet is a healthy choice, rich in omega-3 fatty acids and protein. It's served with a side of seasonal vegetables and a zesty lemon butter sauce for that extra burst of flavor. A feast for both the eyes and palate, this dish is a must-try for seafood enthusiasts.

array0.name: Beef Tenderloin
array0.details: Savor the juiciness of our Beef Tenderloin, a carnivore's dream come true. This succulent cut of beef is expertly seasoned, grilled to perfection, and served with a luscious red wine reduction sauce. With its melt-in-your-mouth texture and robust flavor, this dish is a true classic and a centerpiece of our menu.

array0.name: Vegetarian Pasta - 2oz
array0.details: Experience a burst of flavors with our Vegetarian Pasta, a delightful combination of fresh vegetables and al dente pasta tossed in a creamy pesto sauce. This dish is a celebration of garden-fresh ingredients, perfect for those seeking a wholesome and satisfying meal.

array0.name: Shrimp Scampi
array0.details: Dive into a sea of flavor with our Shrimp Scampi, a seafood lover's paradise. Plump, succulent shrimp are sautéed in a fragrant garlic and white wine sauce, then served over a bed of angel hair pasta. This dish is a harmonious blend of garlic, butter, and the briny sweetness of shrimp that will transport your taste buds to the Mediterranean coast.

array0.name: Chicken Marsala
array0.details: For a taste of Italy, try our Chicken Marsala. Tender chicken breasts are seared to perfection and smothered in a rich marsala wine sauce, accompanied by a medley of sautéed mushrooms. This dish is a comforting and savory embrace that will make you feel like you're dining in the heart of Tuscany.

array1.name: Creamy Tomato Soup - 8oz
array1.details: Indulge in the comforting warmth of our Creamy Tomato Soup, a classic favorite that will soothe your soul. Made with ripe tomatoes, fresh cream, and a medley of herbs, this 8oz bowl is the ultimate comfort food. Each spoonful offers a perfect balance of creaminess and tanginess, making it an ideal choice for a light and satisfying starter.

array1.name: Chicken Noodle Soup - 2cups
array1.details: Rediscover the timeless appeal of Chicken Noodle Soup with our heartwarming rendition. This 2-cup serving features tender chunks of chicken, hearty vegetables, and perfectly cooked noodles, all simmered in a savory broth. It's a wholesome and nurturing choice that brings back cherished memories of home-cooked meals.

array1.name: Lobster Bisque - 500g
array1.details: Elevate your dining experience with our Lobster Bisque, a luxurious soup that exudes elegance. Made from the finest lobster meat, rich cream, and a hint of sherry, this 500g serving is a masterpiece of culinary craftsmanship. The delicate flavors and velvety texture of this bisque make it a superb choice for those seeking a taste of opulence.

array1.name: Clam Chowder
array1.details: Dive into the coastal charm of New England with our Clam Chowder. This soup is a seafood lover's dream, packed with tender clams, hearty potatoes, and smoky bacon in a creamy broth. A comforting bowl of Clam Chowder is like a warm hug on a chilly day, and it's a must-try for lovers of coastal cuisine.

array1.name: French Onion Soup
array1.details: Experience the classic French Onion Soup, a timeless favorite that transcends borders. Our version features a rich, caramelized onion broth topped with melted cheese and toasted croutons. This 8oz bowl is a flavorful journey to the streets of Paris, where each spoonful is a symphony of savory notes.

array2.name: Caprese Salad - 160g
array2.details: Elevate your palate with our Caprese Salad, a harmonious blend of ripe tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, and fragrant basil drizzled with extra virgin olive oil and balsamic glaze. This 160g serving is a celebration of simplicity and quality ingredients, offering a burst of Mediterranean flavors.

array2.name: Caesar Salad
array2.details: Embrace the classic Caesar Salad, a timeless favorite known for its crisp romaine lettuce, crunchy croutons, and savory Caesar dressing. Our version adds a touch of elegance to this salad, making it an ideal choice for those seeking a balance of flavors and textures.

array2.name: Stuffed Mushrooms - 4 servings
array2.details: Experience the indulgence of our Stuffed Mushrooms, a tantalizing appetizer that combines plump mushroom caps with a savory blend of herbs, breadcrumbs, and cheese. This 4-serving dish is perfect for sharing and is sure to delight your taste buds with its earthy and satisfying flavors.

array2.name: Bruschetta - 3 servings
array2.details: Transport your senses to the heart of Italy with our Bruschetta, a flavorful trio of toasted baguette slices topped with ripe tomatoes, fresh basil, garlic, and a drizzle of balsamic reduction. This 3-serving appetizer is a delightful introduction to the bold and vibrant flavors of Italian cuisine.

array2.name: Garlic Bread
array2.details: Indulge in the simple pleasure of Garlic Bread, a beloved side dish that complements any meal. Our version features freshly baked bread brushed with a garlic-infused butter and toasted to golden perfection. It's the perfect accompaniment to elevate your dining experience.

array3.name: Chocolate Lava Cake - 100g
array3.details: End your meal on a sweet note with our decadent Chocolate Lava Cake. This 100g serving is a chocoholic's dream, featuring a rich and gooey chocolate center that oozes with every forkful. Served warm, it's the perfect balance of intense cocoa flavor and sweetness, making it an irresistible dessert for chocolate lovers.

array3.name: Tiramisu - 145g
array3.details: Experience the Italian classic, Tiramisu, like never before. Our 145g serving is a delightful blend of delicate ladyfingers soaked in espresso, layered with creamy mascarpone cheese, and dusted with cocoa powder. Each bite is a symphony of coffee and velvety goodness, making it a sophisticated choice for those with a penchant for Italian desserts.

array3.name: New York Cheesecake - 1 slice 100g
array3.details: Indulge in the timeless allure of our New York Cheesecake. This 100g slice is a slice of creamy heaven, with a lusciously smooth and tangy cheesecake filling nestled atop a buttery graham cracker crust. It's a dessert that strikes the perfect balance between richness and simplicity, making it a classic favorite.

array3.name: Crème Brûlée - 260g
array3.details: Satisfy your sweet cravings with our indulgent Crème Brûlée. This 260g serving is a masterpiece of creamy vanilla custard with a perfectly caramelized sugar crust. Breaking through the delicate caramelized layer reveals a velvety custard beneath, creating a harmonious blend of textures and flavors that's simply divine.

array4.name: Freshly Squeezed Orange Juice
array4.details: Start your day with a burst of freshness from our Freshly Squeezed Orange Juice. Made from the juiciest oranges, this 8oz glass is a zesty and vitamin-packed way to awaken your senses. It's a refreshing and healthy choice that's perfect for a morning pick-me-up.

array4.name: Raspberry Lemonade - 8oz
array4.details: Quench your thirst with our Raspberry Lemonade, a delightful fusion of tart lemons and sweet raspberries. This 8oz glass is a symphony of flavors, balancing the citrusy kick of lemons with the fruity sweetness of raspberries. It's a refreshing and vibrant choice that's perfect for a sunny day.

array4.name: Berry Blast Smoothie - 1cup
array4.details: Revitalize your body with our Berry Blast Smoothie, a vibrant blend of mixed berries, yogurt, and a touch of honey. This 1-cup serving is a burst of antioxidants and energy, making it an ideal choice for those seeking a health-conscious and delicious beverage.

array4.name: Green Tea
array4.details: Savor the simplicity of our Green Tea, a calming and rejuvenating beverage. Made from premium tea leaves, this cup offers a gentle infusion of green tea's natural flavors and soothing properties. It's a perfect choice for those looking for a moment of tranquility.

array4.name: Water
array4.details: Stay hydrated with our refreshing Water, the purest and most essential beverage of all. Served chilled, it's the perfect accompaniment to any meal and a vital part of maintaining your well-being.
